context.p: Person who access the Component Documents through T24 Basic Plug-in for effective understanding of the Component(s).

The user can access the component documents through Component Landscape View which actually helps the user to navigate from one component to another for better understanding of all components. See
for more details.

postreq.p:
T24 Doc View : User can see the overview of the component, tables presented in that component and batches related to that component using T24 Doc View. In addition to it the T24 Doc view has the link to display the word document which having complete documentation about that component. See
for more details.

Component Interaction View : This view helps the user to understanding interaction between the components. See
for more details.
